online_resource.title: ORCID record
online_resource.description: ORCID is an open, non-profit, community-driven effort to create and maintain a registry of unique researcher identifiers and a transparent method of linking research activities and outputs to these identifiers.

metadata_standard.name: ISO 19115-2 Geographic Information - Metadata - Part 2: Extensions for Imagery and Gridded Data

title.value: European Petroleum Survey Group (EPSG) Geodetic Parameter Registry
MAGIC Products Distribution Service Test Record

identification.purpose: Fictitious test record for testing the MAGIC Products Distribution Service.
identification.abstract:
Fictitious test record for testing the MAGIC Products Distribution Service. The resource described by this record is an example of a product that would be distributed through this service. Namely, a map, with a restricted distribution, saved/exported as a PDF and PNG. Crucially this resource is only representative of such a product, it isn't one in itself. Therefore, **no sensitive information will be disclosed if this product is inadvertently or accidentally leaked.** 

 As this is an example record, metadata about this product, including keywords and extents, are either examples, random or arbitrary.
